1.11.2.1.3.5:
- The grue timer can now be reduced down to a single second, and increased up to a minute
- Brightness calculations have been tweaked to take skylight into consideration (no more grues spawning under a tree)
1.11.2.1.3.4:
- Added a configurable list for things to be considered as handheld light sources when Dynamic Lights is installed
- The Grue timer doesn't run if you're in Spectator Mode
- Ported to 1.11.2

1.9.4.1.3.5:
- The grue timer can now be reduced down to a single second, and increased up to a minute
- Brightness calculations have been tweaked to take skylight into consideration (no more grues spawning under a tree)
1.9.4.1.3.4:
- Added a configurable list for things to be considered as handheld light sources when Dynamic Lights is installed
- The Grue timer doesn't run if you're in Spectator Mode
1.9.4.1.3.3:
- Reduced the amount of times the Grue spawning sound is played
- Added a config option to set the height above ground at which you're considered airborne (so Grues no longer spawn in mid-air)
- The Dimension Whitelist should now work correctly when more than a single dimension is whitelisted
- Min and max and default values for numerical config options are now provided in the comments (in favor of those not using the config GUI)
1.9.4.1.3.2:
- The warning message should no longer display when it isn't meant to
- Both Grues now deal damage when colliding with Players
1.9.4.1.3.1:
- Grues can now spawn in tight spaces where it's dark
- Slightly reduced the bounding box size of the Grue
- The game should no longer crash if too many sounds are played
